tool_description: Look up location information for any valid IP address. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/iplookup.
name: IP Lookup by API-Ninjas
title: IP Lookup by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: v1/iplookup
api_list.description: API Ninjas IP Lookup API endpoint.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: IP Address to query. Must be in the format A.B.C.D. For example: 73.9.149.180
